-----

These tutorials for learning how to use Praat are based on the [University of Victoria LING 380 Acoustic Phonetics Lab Manual](https://dspace.library.uvic.ca/items/68b5b175-ebd5-4294-b514-48aa2e58ac98). They are adapted to fit the needs of the York University LING 4220 Acoustic Phonetics class.

<h3> [Lab 1 - Exploring Praat](acoustic_phonetics_labs/new_labs/Lab1.html) </h3> 

Readings to prepare for this lab are:

* Johnson (2012). Chapter 1.
* Baart (2011). Chapter 2.3, 2.4 & 4.2.

<br>

<h3> [Lab 2 - Voicing in Stop Consonants](acoustic_phonetics_labs/new_labs/Lab2.html) </h3> 

The reading to prepare for this lab is:

* Baart (2011) Chapter 3.

<br>

<h3> [Lab 3 - Vowel Properties](acoustic_phonetics_labs/new_labs/Lab3.html) </h3> 

The reading to prepare fo this lab is:

* Johnson (2012) Chapter 2.
